title: brndAvanam iduvO
sahitya:
berndAvanam iduvO kaNnan piLLaiyAi viLaiyADi uLLattai aLLiya


anupallavi

  porundum anbarukk-inba virundAik-kavalai mATrum marundAi rAdhA gOvindan irundE kuzha Udiya


caraNam    dAnavar serukkinait-tagharttup-priyamAna dAsa gOpiyaruDan rAsa krIDai sheidu
kAnattilE gOpAlan kanrugaLai mEittuk-kAdalar cittattaik-kAntam enak-kavarnda
